channel.title: Help me with my client!
channel.description:
i play an rsps and the client used to run and work fine but then i started the batch file one day and i get this error
java.net.UnknownHostException: rainbow.servequake.com at java.net.Inet4AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source) at Jframe.<init>(Jframe.java:25) at client.main(client.java:2457) at NoClassNeeded.main(NoClassNeeded.java:74)
could someone tell me what that means and how to fix it?
thanks

item.title: Help me with my client!
item.dc:creator: @metal_k0 metal k0
item.description:
@metal_k0 wrote:

You recently changed your IP that the client connects to? You probably missed something with that.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me with my client!
item.dc:creator: @racecar12 racecar12
item.description:
@racecar12 wrote:

i play an rsps and the client used to run and work fine but then i started the batch file one day and i get this error

java.net.UnknownHostException: rainbow.servequake.com
at java.net.Inet4AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(Unknown Source)
at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(Unknown Source)
at Jframe.(Jframe.java:25)
at client.main(client.java:2457)
at NoClassNeeded.main(NoClassNeeded.java:74)

could someone tell me what that means and how to fix it?

thanks
